messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
Shooting in the courthouse, officer down, shooting.
I can't understand you. What's going on?
Shooting in the courthouse, officer is down.
A police officer is down?
Yes, it's a jail control. Jailer is down.
Okay, please don't hang up. I'm going to get some help.
Okay, listen. Ma'am, I need to talk to the ambulance, okay? Please don't hang up.
The suspect has a light blue shirt on.
Okay, please don't hang up.
Light blue shirt at the front door. He used a gun in here.
Linda, I'm on it. Do you have any staff?
Don't go over there. Stay on the phone.
Ma'am, what's your name? Who was shot?
I believe it was a corrections officer from the county jails.
Okay. Careful. Was he killed?
Oh my God. He took her gun.
Linda, who had the gun?
I don't know. It was a person in the blue shirt.
I believe the corrections officer was transporting a male subject in a blue shirt who then took the officer's gun.
Okay, so a male subject in a light blue shirt took the officer's gun?
And shot the corrections officer?
Yes, shot the corrections officer. I believe, I'm pretty sure.
Okay. Linda, are you a witness or do you work there?
I work in the court office.
Bill Laris was wrestling with him. He shoved his arm and tried to get him to grab the gun.
I took off running.
I'm just keeping you on the phone until I can get somebody there, okay?
I'm in the Sheriff's Department room.
Okay, can you tell me which area you're in? District court, you said?
I'm in the District Court. I'm standing in the Office of the Sheriff's Department right now.
Okay. Thank you for your information.
We need police at the courthouse on the second floor.
Okay, what's going on up there?
I think there were gunshots.
Someone was shot?
Yes, we need an ambulance and police officers.
Which part of the courthouse?
Second floor, I believe.
And he's got the gun?
Yes, he has the gun. We need police officers now.
Okay, we're getting them on the way. Please stay on the line.
Is anyone still there with a gun?
Yes, he's still here with the gun.
Who has the gun?
I don't know. A male in a blue shirt.
Do you know if anybody's hurt?
A woman was shot, I believe.
We're getting help. Don't hang up.
Do you need anything?
Just information on who has the gun.
I'm not sure. He had a blue shirt on.
Do you know where he went?
I think he ran out the front door of the courthouse.
The officer was shot in the arm and the judge was stabbed?
Yes, but it's not life-threatening.
Describe the suspect: male, black pants, blue shirt. Stay there.
Also requesting K-9 units. All available units respond.
